BEACH DATES
DATE SCHEDULING

{mood:happy}Oh I haven't introduced myself!{break}{mood:default}My name is Ossono, and I run the tavern here on Moonstone Island.{break}Come on by any time!{break}{mood:laugh}Well, any time we're open, I mean.

{mood:like}Thanks for asking me to go on a walk with you.{break}{npc:down}{mood:awkward}I love the way the beach feels at night...{break}{mood:default}Sometimes it feels like the only time I can take a big, deep breath.{break}This is a weird question, but... Do you enjoy your job?
{mood:happy}Sounds great! See you at 20:00!
I love the variety!
Maybe some other time, ok?...
Hello.{random}Oh, hi!{random}Hey!{random}What's up?
It's alright.
We’ve gone there a lot. Let’s try somewhere else.
Hey, babe!
Not really...

{mood:like}Yeah, that's what I was thinking!{break}You get to do so many different things.{break}{mood:default}Sometimes I feel like every day is the same at the tavern!{break}{mood:like}But... tonight was really nice. Thank you for the break.{break}Goodnight!
GIFTS
Later.{random}See ya.{random}Bye!

{mood:like}I think it looks really fun.{break}{mood:laugh}Maybe we should swap jobs some day!{break}{mood:like}Don't worry, I'm not serious. I could never do what you do.{break}I should go... it's getting late.{break}{mood:happy}Good night!
{mood:happy}For me? Seriously?{break}This will really help me get through the day! Thank you!
Talk to you later!
Oh. That's a shame.{break}{mood:sad}All that training, having to move away from home... And you don't even like it?{break}{mood:default}Well... I should head home, it's pretty late.{break}Good night.
{mood:like}No way! I really like flowers!{break}These smell AMAZING. Thank you!
See you tonight!
Oh, thanks for this!
Alright, back to work for me.

{mood:happy}I'm so glad you asked me to go to the beach again!{break}{mood:default}It's one of my favourite places.{break}I love that we have access to a beach and a mountain here. We're so lucky.{break}{npc:up}Are the other islands like this? Or are they even more beautiful?{break}{npc:left}{mood:happy}Maybe you could take me with you some time! I could help!
Ooooh, nooo.{break}{mood:awkward}I'm sorry, but I can't stand the taste of these.{break}{mood:default}So, uh, no thanks!
Bye, babe!
I would love the help, actually.
{mood:dislike}Why would you give me this? Is this a prank? This smells horrible.
Sure, but you don't need to help!
Hiiiii, pumpkin!{random}Come here and give your wife a kiss!
No, it's too dangerous.
{mood:angry}Hey, if you're going to make plans, at least show up for them.{break}{mood:dislike}My time is just as valuable as yours.
Morning, pumpkin!

{mood:happy}I'm so glad you said that! I love being useful.{break}{mood:default}I feel awkward if I'm just sitting around doing nothing, you know? I have to stay busy!{break}{mood:laugh}Speaking of busy, I have to get back to the tavern. Sorry!{break}{mood:like}Thank you for another lovely date.
I'm so sorry!
Evening, pumpkin.

{mood:happy}Aw, but I want to! I'm sure there's something I can do.{break}{mood:like}I'd still be happy to come along for the ride, though.{break}{mood:laugh}I'll probably end up helping whether you want me to or not!{break}{mood:default}I need to head back to the tavern, but let's do this again some time, okay?
*Give an excuse*
{mood:dislike}I can handle it.{break}You don't have to treat me like I'm delicate, you know.{break}{npc:right}Actually, I just remembered I have to be somewhere. I'll see you around.
{mood:dislike}Just don't do it again.{break}I might look cute, but I can be scary when I want.
See you later, pumpkin.{random}Love you, pumpkin!
Back to work, pumpkin!

{mood:laugh}...and my parents would have to stop me picking up every single interesting bit of seaweed!{break}{mood:default}It's not my fault the ocean is so cool. Plus, a lot of seaweed is edible.{break}{mood:like}Maybe some time you can try my kelp soup! It's... very salty.{break}...{break}{mood:laugh}Okay, tell me the honest truth: What do you think of my cooking?
{mood:like}Guess what!{break}{mood:happy}It's my birthday!!!!{break}{mood:laugh}Today's the one day where everyone HAS to be nice to me, right?{break}And that means you HAVE to tip 30%!
Goodnight, pumpkin!
I love trying new things!
{mood:happy}You got me something for my birthday?!{break}That's so sweet of you. Thank you!
It's... experimental.
Oh, is... this... for me?{break}Oh, it's a birthday... gift?{break}{mood:awkward}Uh... I don't really like these. Sorry!
You should stick to beer.

{mood:happy}Me too! The weirder the better.{break}A lot of the other townsfolk aren't as brave as you and me!{break}{mood:awkward}Oh, this is awkward, but...{break}I just had an incredible idea for a new dish.{break}{mood:laugh}I need to go write it down or I'll forget!{break}{mood:happy}Sorry for cutting the date short, but let's do this again!
I think the tavern needs some fresh flowers.

{mood:happy}I guess you could say that!{break}{mood:like}I like trying different ideas, even if they don't all work.{break}And I love finding new ingredients and techniques.{break}It feels like I'm always learning, you know?{break}Maybe I'll try some more "normal" dishes in the future.{break}I need to head home now, but thank you for another really lovely date.{break}{mood:happy}Bye!
{mood:like}Do you just wander around all day? I'd love that.
{mood:sad}Oh. Yeah, maybe you're right.{break}I should stick to what I know.{break}Trying new things... it doesn't always pay off.{break}{mood:default}I should get back before it gets too late. Bye.
// Confirmation dialogue when you give an NPC a moonstone baracelet
Most people hate Wednesdays, but I think they're alright.
Oh! Are you asking me to be your girlfriend?
{mood:happy}It's almost the weekend!

Oh, before I forget... I made you these.{break}{mood:happy}They're seaweed truffles.{break}{mood:like} They're made with the seaweed I found last time we were here!{break}You should try one and tell me what you think.
Yes! Would you like that?
{mood:like}Friday at last.{break}{mood:sad}It's one of my busiest days at work, though!
Let's both try them!
Oh, sorry, no...
I always wake up late on Saturday and then I feel so tired all day.
Oh, yum...
{mood:happy}Yeah! of course! I would love to be your girlfriend!{break}I'm gonna go tell Gaiana. Teehee!
Maybe I'll go to the hot spring next week.{break}{mood:dislike}If I have time.
Ew. No thanks.
{mood:sad}Sure, yeah. I understand.{break}...{break}{mood:awkward}...This is, uh, kinda awkward, now...{break}{mood:default}I'm just gonna go back to what I was doing, then.

{mood:happy}That's a great idea!{break}{mood:default}*chomp*{break}Hmmm...{break}...{break}{mood:happy}They're actually really good!{break}{mood:like}The saltiness of the seaweed really brings out the sweetness of the chocolate.{break}{mood:happy}Thank you for being brave and letting me taste-test them with you!{break}{mood:like}I'll walk you home. Just in case the seaweed truffles have, um, side effects.
{mood:dislike}I can't believe I'm spending my day off thinking about work.

{mood:happy}What do you think?{break}{mood:default}Oh, are you okay...?{break}Your face has gone a weird colour.{break}{mood:like}...You like them?{break}{mood:happy}That's so great!{break}{mood:laugh}You're very brave to have tried something new.{break}{mood:like}But the saltiness sort of complements the chocolate, don't you think?{break}{mood:love}Thank you for trying them. You're really sweet.{break}{mood:happy}And as a thank you, let me walk you home!
// If heart level is too low, NPC will decline the bracelet
{mood:dislike}Happy Tuesday!{break}I just found a rat in the tavern basement!

{mood:sad}They're not as bad as they sound.{break}I tried one already, they're really nice.{break}{mood:default}I'm not going to force you though! It's fine!{break}I'll just take them back home with me. Maybe Gaiana will have one.{break}Good night.
{mood:awkward}Sorry, I’m not ready for that yet.{break}Maybe once I get to know you a little better...
There's so much to do! And so little time!{break}{mood:laugh}I'll sleep when I'm dead!
Do you ever miss your family and friends back home?
TAVERN DATES
{mood:happy}I can't wait for the weekend!

{mood:like}I'm glad you asked me out!{break}It feels a bit weird to be on the other side of the counter here...{break}{mood:laugh}Maybe that means I should spend less time behind it!{break}{mood:default}How do you keep yourself from working too much?
// Confirmation dialogue when you give an NPC a grass baracelet
Working hard, or hardly working, am I right?{break}{mood:laugh}I'm so envious of your life sometimes! Take me with you!!
I try to put myself first.
...Are you breaking up with me?
{mood:like}It's days like this when I'm so happy that I live here.
I haven't figured that out yet!
Yeah. Sorry.
I don't. My work is too important.
Is that what this means?! No!!
{mood:like}The plants that grow around here are delicious.

I'm glad to hear it. You're no good to anyone if you're not taking care of yourself.{break}{mood:like}If you ever need a break, you can just come to the tavern.{break}{mood:happy}I'm always happy to have company, and you're good company.{break}{mood:dislike}Aw, heck. Sorry to cut this short... But I should head back to work.{break}{mood:like}Thank you for the date!
{mood:sad}...If that's what you want.{break}I guess there's not much I can say to make you change your mind.
{mood:sad}I had a beer tasting last night and now my head hurts...

{mood:laugh}Haha, me neither. It's so hard, isn't it?{break}{mood:like}Sometimes I take breaks but I end up getting fidgety, so I just work anyway!{break}{mood:laugh}Speaking of work, I should get back to it.{break}{mood:happy}Thank you for the company!
{mood:laugh}Oh, thank goodness.{break}{mood:like}I was not having a good day, and that would not have helped.
I hope you're keeping safe out there.
Well, sure! But you're no good to anyone if you're burnt out.{break}Not that you need to be good at your job to be valuable...{break}Well, I should get back to it. See ya!
Don't you ever get scared flying above the clouds?
I'm so tired today! I don't know why.

I find the smell of the tavern really... comforting.{break}{mood:like}I know it smells like stale sweat and old beer, but in a weird way, it smells like... home.{break}{mood:laugh}I'm really sensitive to smells, in case you hadn't noticed!{break}{mood:like}But don't worry... I really like the way you smell.{break}{mood:awkward}I mean, not in a weird way! I just mean, uh...
Hey, we're having this fireworks show in a bit.{break}If you don't have anyone to watch it with...{break}{mood:like}Um, you can watch it with me, if you like!
I need to start going to bed earlier.
It's my natural musk!
Of course!
{mood:like}I really needed this day off!{break}Maybe I'll go swimming later.
I like the way you smell too.
Can I get back to you on that?
You need to work on your compliments.
{mood:happy}Great, cool!{break}{mood:like}So, yeah... get ready! It's gonna be pretty spectacular.
I'm thinking of making some soup out of the herbs on the mountain.

Your very own scent.{break}{mood:laugh}Maybe you could make it and sell it in your own shop!{break}{mood:default}As long as you don't put me out of business, of course.{break}{mood:laugh}What? I have to work really hard to keep this place afloat! LITERALLY!{break}{mood:default}Speaking of selling things...I should get back to work.{break}You can stay here if you want!{break}{mood:laugh}But you won't get free drinks!
{mood:dislike}Winter always makes me feel so SLOW.{break}Like my blood is all slushy or something.

{mood:laugh}Thanks.{break}{mood:default}I shouldn't say weird stuff like that, though.{break}I was worried you'd react badly.{break}I'll work on my compliments for next time.{break}{mood:awkward}I mean, if there is a next time.{break}I don't want to assume!{break}{mood:laugh}Uhhhh... I should get back to work.
// When the player gives a spirit to an NPC (the matchmaker quest)
{mood:awkward}Last night was so cold, I had to make a nest out of blankets!

{npc:down}{mood:sad}Yeah, you're right.{break}I'm sorry.{break}I just get really awkward when, um... Never mind.{break}{mood:laugh}I should get back to work!{break}{mood:default}I'm sorry for, well... you know.

{mood:happy}Hello, little Capacibee!{break}He's perfect!{break}{mood:like}I'm going to call him Beetholomew. We're going to work together, Beetholomew!{break}{mood:happy}You did great, Alchemist. Seriously, thank you so much.{break}{mood:like}As a thank you... you can have a free coffee, on the house, whenever you want.{break}{mood:dislike}Only one a day, though! I'm not made of money!{break}{mood:like}And it'll mean you come by to say hi more often, right?
{mood:like}How's it going, alchemist?
{mood:like}This little guy is very cute, but I'm pretty sure that's not a Capacibee.{break}{mood:happy}Capacibee is about this big, round, and yellow. Hard to miss!
I think Rowan is sick today.{break}I might take them some soup later.
{mood:sad}Hey... I hope you don't mind, but I've had a bit of a rough day.{break}Can we just sit here for a bit?{break}...{break}...{break}{mood:default}...Thank you.
I'm thinking I might whip myself up a hot toddy.
Is everything okay?
{mood:like}Thanks for helping me, Alchemist. You're a star.{break}{mood:happy}Here - take my tips for the day as a way of saying thanks!
Not long now until spring comes back...
I don't mind.
This isn't much of a date...
Text

Yeah, I just needed a tiny breather. I'm okay.{break}{mood:like}Honestly, just having you here... it helps.{break}{mood:awkward}I know I'm usually bubbly and fun, sorry!{break}{mood:laugh}I'll pick up the tab on the next date as an apology.{break}{mood:like}Let's just... stay here a little while longer, okay?
{mood:like}Happy spring!{break}It's a tradition of mine to go out and pick spring flowers.{break}{mood:laugh}Not all of them, of course! Just enough for a small vase.

{mood:sad}I hate that you're seeing this side of me on a date.{break}But sometimes it's just so exhausting to keep up the facade, you know?{break}Especially on a long and tough day like today.{break}{mood:default}I think I should head off to bed. Sleep it off.{break}{mood:like}Thanks for another great date.
// Confirmation dialogue when you propose to marry and all conditions are met
It's Quill's birthday tomorrow.{break}{mood:like}He likes warm things. And fire.{break}{mood:happy}Just in case you're struggling for gift ideas!
{mood:dislike}You don't have to be a jerk about it.{break}You could have just said no.{break}Forget this, I need sleep.{break}Good night.
{mood:like}Are you serious? Are you actually proposing right now???
Have you been to the hot spring yet?{break}{mood:happy}You should treat yourself to a soak!{break}{mood:sad}It always makes me feel better, but I never have time to go any more.
I am!
{mood:like}I've always loved it up here. It reminds me of being a kid.{break}I sometimes pick flowers up here and turn them into perfume.

I think, if resurrection is real, I'd like to come back as a snail.{break}{mood:happy}I mean, you can travel anywhere you want! Just... really slowly!{break}And when you get tired, you can just SMOOOSH yourself inside your shell!{break}{mood:like}I have always liked the idea of going travelling, too. It sounds really freeing.{break}It's hard to leave the island without a vehicle, though.{break}What about you?
Haha, no. Prank'd!

My mom used to tell me about these incredible creatures called Guardians.{break}Apparently, they were built by people in the old kingdom to protect... something.{break}{mood:laugh}She said it was places of worship, but sometimes she said it was treasure!{break}Maybe it was both...
If you're a snail, I'm a snail.
{mood:happy}Then my answer is yes! Yes, I would love to marry you!{break}{mood:love}I can't believe how lucky I am. I love you.

Have you ever seen Guardians in the wild?{break}{mood:laugh}My mom told me stories about them... but I don't know if they were true!{break}{mood:default}I mean, gigantic moving statues? I've never seen anything like that.{break}They sound super scary.
I'd be a bird.
{mood:angry}That's... really mean.
Want to know a secret?{break}{mood:happy}I'm my own boss, so I'm going to let myself have a cheeky pint later!
Death is final, and snails are stupid.
Can I get you anything?{break}It's pretty quiet today.

{mood:laugh}Well, aren't you sweet! Alright then.{break}{mood:like}We'll go snail-travelling together. We'll hold hands. Snail-hands. Snands.{break}Or whatever it is that snails have. Eye stalks? Eww.{break}{mood:laugh}I'm sure it's more romantic when you're a snail!{break}{mood:awkward}Oh noooo, look at the time!{break}{mood:laugh}I have to finish tidying the place before tomorrow.{break}I bet snails don't have to deal with things like tidying!
// If too early to marry, NPC will decline the bracelet
Thanks so much for coming tonight. Everyone is going to be happy to see you.{break}Drink up!

{mood:awkward}Noooo! Birds eat snails!{break}{mood:default}I can't believe you'd want to be my natural enemy.{break}{mood:laugh}Wait, are you trying to kill me in this life, too? Do I look like a tasty snail?!{break}{mood:happy}I'm probably very poisonous from being around beer all day, so don't even try it.{break}{mood:awkward}Oh nooooo, look at the time!{break}{mood:laugh}I have to finish tidying the place before tomorrow.{break}I bet birds don't have to deal with this!
{mood:awkward}Oh, uh... I'm going to have to say no, sorry.{break}{mood:laugh}I mean, we don't know each other well enough yet! You don't even know my middle name!
{mood:sad}I don't think I'm great company today. I'm so tired.{break}I need to save my energy for the customers...

{mood:dislike}Have you ever heard of "yes, and"?{break}It's more fun to keep a conversation going, you know.{break}You don't have to make me feel like a weirdo for trying to have fun.{break}You know, you could be a wasp. Because you're a buzzkill.{break}I'm going upstairs. Bye.
Don't you just love the scent of the lake?{break}Some people think it's too fishy, but I think it's wonderful.
{mood:happy}Congratulations, you two! May you both live a long and romantic life!
Zed told me he saw some kinda glowing thing out there last night.{break}I wonder what it was.
HOTSPRING DATES

{mood:happy}Thanks for inviting me to the hot spring!{break}{mood:like}I'm always looking for excuses to come here.{break}{mood:default}I usually come here alone, because, well...{break}{mood:awkward}I... I feel a little awkward. I don't like being so... exposed.
{mood:laugh}I think I'm ready to go home and sleep for a thousand years!{break}{mood:love}Unless you have other, non-sleeping-related plans...
{mood:happy}Summer's here!{break}{mood:like}I love it when it gets hot enough to keep all the windows open.{break}{mood:happy}Oh, aaaand it's my birthday soon. Hint hint!
I think you look great.
Sure, let's get outta here!
{mood:happy}I just finished making a gift for Ferra's birthday tomorrow.{break}I hope she likes it!
I can close my eyes if you want!
Let's stay a bit longer, ok?
{mood:happy}It's my birthday tomorrow!
You should dress like this more often.

{mood:awkward}Zed and Cleo were just telling me that the dungeons out there are full of traps?!{break}That sounds so dangerous!{break}{mood:default}But I guess they were designed to keep Spirits out, not Alchemists... Just be careful, okay?

{mood:like}You really think so?{break}Um, thank you. You didn't have to say that.{break}{mood:happy}You're really nice, you know.{break}{mood:like}I think... I think I'd like to come here with you again some time.{break}{mood:laugh}But for now, let's just close our eyes and relax!{break}{mood:like}Just like this.......
{mood:like}Amazing work, Alchemist. I dread to think what might have happened if you hadn't come along.{break}{mood:happy}Running a business is hard enough without the threat of impending doom!
I'm trying to make the most of my day off today.{break}{mood:like}I'm glad I got to see you.

{mood:laugh}Haha, don't be silly.{break}{mood:like}It's alright!{break}{mood:love}In fact, I feel more comfortable with you than I thought I would.{break}So, um, I'll just try to relax a little more.{break}{mood:laugh}That's what a hot spring's for, after all!{break}{mood:like}Let's close our eyes and relax together...
Don't tell him I said this... but I used to have SUCH a crush on Quill.{break}{mood:laugh}Don't worry, he's no threat to you!

{mood:awkward}{npc:right}Oh, um, well, it's not really... my style. {break}{npc:up}I mean, um, revealing stuff. It's not... Um...{break}{npc:down}I should go. Could you... Could you not look at me as I get out?
// UNUSED
I'm boooooored.{break}{mood:happy}Thanks for coming in to say hi.
Wow just like my mom used to make! Thank you!
I admit, I'm pretty curious about what's out there.{break}{mood:like}Maybe you could describe it to me some time?

I reeeeeeeally needed this today.{break}{mood:like}I can feel my angry muscles getting all melty in the heat.{break}{mood:laugh}Cleo says I've been carrying too much stress in my shoulders.{break}{mood:like}What do you do when you're stressed?
{mood:like}Do you think you'd ever be willing to let me try out your broom?
I find you.

Do you think ancient Spirit-gods would like my Dish of the Day?{break}{mood:laugh}Maybe I shouldn't risk it... I don't want to kill a god.{break}{mood:happy}Hey, if you wanna watch it with me, that would be really cool!
There's nothing like a nice cold beer on a day like today.
I fly around.
{mood:happy}Yay!
{mood:like}I'm glad you're here. I was having a nightmare of a day.{break}{mood:dislike}I didn't get to have breakfast today because the bread was moldy. Ew.
Stress is a sign of weakness.
If you're not too busy, please come to the tavern tonight.{break}{mood:dislike}I'm not in the mood for... some of the patrons.{break}You know the ones.

{mood:laugh}Seriously?! You are too much!{break}{mood:like}I never really thought of myself as someone who can be a de-stresser.{break}{mood:love}I'm glad I can help. I feel like... maybe you do the same for me.{break}I'm still getting used to all this...{break}Thank you for being patient with me.{break}{mood:happy}Are you ready to get out now?{break}{mood:laugh}If my muscles melt any more, I'll be a puddle!

{mood:like}Meteor showers are so beautiful.{break}{mood:happy}Maybe I should make a meteor-themed dish to celebrate? Spaghetti and meteorballs?{break}{mood:like}So... Would you like to watch the shower with me?
I'm glad you came! I was hoping you would.{break}I have to work, but you have fun, okay?

{mood:laugh}Oh, I'm so envious of you!{break}{mood:like}Flying looks so freeing.{break}Sometimes I like to sit outside on a windy day, close my eyes, and pretend I'm flying.{break}{mood:laugh}I think that's maybe the closest to flying I'm willing to get for now!{break}{mood:like}But maybe one day I'll be brave enough to go out with you.{break}Speaking of going out, I'm going to get out now.{break}{mood:laugh}If my muscles melt any more, I'll be a puddle!
{mood:happy}Yay!
{mood:sad}I'm missing Waldo a lot today.{break}I hope he's okay, but I wish he'd come back.

{mood:dislike}You don't seriously believe that, do you?{break}Stress isn't good, but it's natural.{break}Maybe I shouldn't ask you for advice if you're going to be mean.{break}I need to get out. My fingers are all pruney anyway.
Did you get my latest newsletter?{break}{mood:laugh}I don't remember if I sent it out or not...
{mood:happy}Heyyy, you came! Are you ready to start the festival?{break}{mood:like}Which dish you want to present?
{mood:like}I love this weather. It makes everything smell so earthy.{break}{mood:happy}Do you think I'm weird for thinking dirt smells nice?

Listen, we've been on a few dates now, and I have to ask...{break}When we talk, how do you know what to say?{break}{mood:like}I mean, I just say whatever's in my head... but you're not like that.{break}You don't say much, I know.{break}{mood:love}But when you do, it always makes a difference.
{mood:like}Okay, I'll just put it over here... next to mine...
I follow my heart.
Text
I pick from three options.
{npc:up}{mood:laugh}The leaves are turning red! It's fall!!!!{break}{npc:left}{mood:happy}You know what that means: It's Squish Stew time, baby.{break}{mood:default}I love Squish Stew time.
Maybe you talk too much.
Please be careful not to eat any poisonous mushrooms...{break}{mood:awkward}I don't think anyone would be able to rescue you!

{mood:happy}That's very sweet.{break}{mood:like}I suppose it's working, so far.{break}{mood:laugh}Maybe I should follow my heart a little more, and not overthink everything...{break}{mood:love}If I followed my heart right now, then...{break}{mood:laugh}...then I'd probably say something really embarrassing!{break}{mood:love}So, um, let's just sit here together, in silence, for a little bit.{break}{mood:happy}Sometimes I say things best when I say nothing at all.
I wonder what life was like under the clouds.{break}Probably a lot less windy.

{mood:happy}...Really? I mean, you come up with three options every time?{break}That sounds like a lot of work.{break}{mood:default}Wait, what were your three options just then??{break}{mood:laugh}Don't answer that! I don't want to know!{break}{mood:love}I like that we're different like that.{break}You're thoughtful, I'm spontaneous.{break}We make a good match.{break}{mood:laugh}I can't imagine having to choose from three options every single time I spoke!{break}{mood:like}Are you ready to dry off and head home?{break}{mood:laugh}Yes, no, or in a bit?

Um... has Quill said anything to you lately?{break}I think I've hurt his feelings, and I feel awful.{break}{mood:sad}I grew up with a ton of brothers, so I learned to show affection through pranks.{break}But... lately I've realised that it's not fair on Quill...{break}I should talk to him.
{mood:dislike}If you think I talk too much, why do you keep asking me on dates?{break}Well, I guess I'll just talk less... by leaving.
Working hard, or hardly working, am I right?{break}{mood:laugh}I'm so envious of your life sometimes! Take me with you!!
Hey, you're here!{break}Hey everyone, look who showed up!{break}{mood:laugh}Haha, don't be shy!

Listen... There aren't many places on Moonstone Island that are this... secluded.{break}{npc:down}{mood:sad}So... I need to be honest with you.{break}Because I trust you. And I need help.{break}I'm so exhausted, all the time.{break}{mood:sad}I feel like I've spent all my energy on trying to make people happy.{break}And it doesn't make ME happy any more.{break}{npc:left}I don't know what to do. I can't keep going on like this!
You know, I once tried to start a minigolf course here on Moonstone Island.{break}{mood:laugh}We lost all the golf balls off the edge in about a week.
Don't set yourself on fire to keep others warm.
I had a dream that Moonstone Island fell out of the sky.{break}{mood:sad}I feel like I've been having a lot of stressful dreams lately!
You need self-care.
You're being a bit dramatic, don't you think?
I love winter. It's my favourite season.{break}{mood:happy}The soups! The blankets! The fires!{break}{mood:laugh}I like fires in a normal way. Not in an arson way. I promise.

...I guess that is what I'm doing, isn't it?{break}{mood:sad}I just want people to like me. And I figure it doesn't matter if I'm tired. As long as they like me.{break}But I'm not being kind to myself.{break}It's like... I don't count as someone to be nice to.{break}{mood:like}I'm glad I have you to remind me that I'm worth looking after, too.{break}{mood:love}Do you want to stay here and cuddle for a bit?
{mood:laugh}I think I might need to start wearing glasses soon.{break}{mood:happy}The other day I thought a tree was Gaiana.

You're right, but... I don't know how.{break}The relaxation stuff only works for a little while, and then I'm just back to feeling like this...{break}I'm sorry. I know you're not a therapist. I just thought... maybe...{break}Don't worry about it. I think I need to sleep it off.
So, I've been thinking...{break}{mood:like}I would love to know more about alchemy some time!{break}I know some things, but you're so good at everything. It's really impressive.

{mood:dislike}Hey, I was trying to open up to you!{break}{mood:angry}Do you even know how hard that is for me?{break}I spend all day listening to OTHER people. I just wanted one person to listen to me!{break}{mood:dislike}Thanks for making me feel worse. Jerk.
As much as I love Winter, I wish I had someone to share it with.{break}The nights get so cold...
I'm really not having a good day today. I don't know what's wrong.{break}I keep spilling drinks and dropping cutlery. I'm probably just tired. Don't worry!
HOME DATES
Welcome! Grab yourself a seat.{break}It's pretty busy tonight, but at least it's warm!
So, what do you do after a day's work?{break}When I'm finished at the tavern, I usually grab a small drink and relax.{break}{mood:laugh}But lately, I've been spending a lot of that time with you!
I hope you're okay. You've been looking so tired lately.{break}Make sure to take breaks, okay?
I usually think about you.
I thought I saw the aurora borealis last night!{break}But it was just that glowing thing in the distance again.
I put things in chests and go to sleep immediately.
I'd love to spend it alone.

{mood:awkward}You charmer!!{break}{mood:like}I don't know whether to be flattered or horrified.{break}Nah, don't worry. I...{break}{npc:love}I think about you a lot too.{break}{mood:laugh}And with that... I'm going to bed.{break}{mood:love}You can, um... come with me if you'd like.
{mood:happy}Come warm up by the fire! You look soaked to the bone!

{mood:laugh}Wow, really?{break}{mood:default}You must be like me. Zero free time.{break}{mood:dislike}Not that it's a good thing to have no time to yourself.{break}{mood:like}I'm just glad you find time to do these dates with me.{break}So, thank you for another lovely date.{break}{mood:love}But, um, you don't have to go just yet. If you don't want to.
You're here early.{break}Not to judge, but are you okay?{break}{mood:like}Or are you just here to say hi?
{mood:dislike}Huh. Well, sorry for ruining your evening, I guess.{break}I think you should go be alone somewhere else.
{mood:sad}I have the WORST headache today.{break}{mood:awkward}Did I say anything embarrassing last night?
{mood:happy}How's your day going, gorgeous?

You know, I have to tell you something... It's a bit embarrassing.{break}{mood:like}The first time I met you... and the second time, and the third time...{break}I was SO envious of you. You seemed so competent and capable!{break}{mood:laugh}I kinda hated you a little bit. Sorry!
{mood:dislike}This rain is giving me a headache.{break}Don't you have, like... weather potions, or something?
I broke my very important broom the second I got here, actually.
{mood:happy}You look really nice today!
You don't hate me now... right?
{mood:love}Thanks for coming to see me at work.
You need to get over yourself.
I'm thinking about getting back into bed.{break}{mood:happy}You can join me if you like!

{mood:laugh}You what?! Like, you crash landed? You poor thing!{break}{mood:like}Okay, that's made me feel a little better, knowing you aren't totally perfect.{break}{mood:laugh}Although I probably break stuff at the tavern every week or so!{break}{mood:happy}Maybe I should switch to paper plates.{break}{mood:love}I'm glad I got to know you better, though.{break}I'm not envious of you any more. I like you too much.{break}Do you want to stay over tonight?
Quill's taking care of the tavern today.{break}He's such an angel.

{mood:laugh}No, you're alright.{break}{mood:like}I've enjoyed these dates a lot, actually.{break}It's been... nice to open up to someone.{break}{mood:sad}I mean, I have... I HAD Waldo, but he's gone.{break}{mood:like}So now I have you.{break}{mood:love}Do you maybe want to stay over tonight?
I feel like we should have one of those Town Criers.{break}You know, with the big bell. Yells all the news.{break}Maybe I can send a letter to the Council of Islands to see if they'll send someone...

{mood:sad}Yeah, I mean... I know it's not cool to judge people so quickly.{break}{npc:down}And no one wants to be with someone who's insecure.{break}{mood:default}...It's late. We should... call it a night.
Have you been up here much?{break}It's beautiful, isn't it?{break}I never get tired of the view.
{mood:like}I love all the scents your nose can pick up on a breeze.

You know, they say the tavern is haunted.{break}{mood:laugh}No, really! They say it's haunted by the ghost of an old tavern keeper.{break}{mood:default}They say... {break}...he stepped on a rake... {break}...and cracked his head open...{break}Blood and brains EVERYWHERE. I'm glad I didn't have to clean up.{break}You know, on quiet nights, they say you can hear him singing...
{mood:happy}I love foraging!{break}{mood:like}It's like borrowing from nature's tasty pantry.
I've heard the singing, and definitely not a ghost.
I love living where I work.{break}{mood:happy}The commute is so easy!
Who is "they" in this story?
I wish I had some fresh-cut flowers in here.
Ghosts aren't real.
{mood:happy}I love swimming.{break}Swimming is like taking a shower, but with fish in it.{break}{mood:default}I just wish I had more time to do it...

{mood:laugh}Okay, yes, sometimes I sing when I'm alone in the tavern!{break}{mood:like}Can you blame me? It's really boring sometimes!{break}We only have a handful of people living here, and when they're all busy, I like to sing.{break}{mood:happy}Maybe you should join me for a karaoke session some time.{break}{mood:like}Before it gets too late, are you staying over?{break}{mood:love}I would really like it if you did.

{mood:happy}You know. They.{break}The people who tell ghost stories.{break}{mood:like}The people who want more visitors to come to the tavern more often.{break}{mood:happy}Maybe the people who have a vested interest in increased customers.{break}{mood:laugh}Them. That's who "they" is.{break}{mood:like}By the way, are you staying over tonight?{break}{mood:happy}I tidied my room and everything!
Text
Booooo. You're no fun.{break}Even if ghosts aren't real, you're supposed to go along with it.{break}You should go home, before the ghosts turn up.{break}Maybe they'll go along with my jokes.
How's your day so far, pumpkin?{break}{mood:happy}Mine is better for having seen you!
{mood:love}I don't mind winter so much when I have a cutie to cuddle.

I used to think, when I was little, that I'd be settled down by now.{break}{mood:laugh}I spent ages planning elaborate weddings for my dolls.{break}{mood:default}I don't even know if that's what I wanted. I just thought I did.{break}Now I'm older... There's part of me that feels like I let that little girl down.{break}I spend all day, every day in the tavern.{break}If I'm not working, I'm sleeping. And that's it.{break}{npc:down}{mood:sad}What if I'm not what she expected? Or what she wanted?{break}I spent so long focusing on work at the expense of everything else...{break}What if it's too late?
Can I get you anything?{break}{mood:laugh}I'm sorry I can't do family discounts, but I need the money... I have a spouse at home to feed!
You have to live for you, not her.
{mood:happy}Come here and give your favourite wife a kiss!
I think she'd be proud.
{mood:dislike}Hmmm... You look like you need a kiss.{break}{mood:happy}MMMMWAH! Love you!
Marriage is a scam.
We should do a jigsaw tonight.{break}{mood:happy}I LOVE JIGSAWS. And you. Imagine how much better it would be if I combined them both!

...I guess you're right.{break}I mean, she is me. I am her.{break}And what I want now is far more important, and relevant.{break}And if I'm honest... I love working.{break}{mood:like}Although I can definitely afford to take more breaks.{break}{mood:love}Especially if those breaks involve time with you.{break}{mood:laugh}You're so damn wise, you know. It's infuriating.{break}{mood:love}But maybe... maybe I'm finally finding the person I could envision that life with.{break}I love you.

{mood:love}I was just thinking... about how much my life has improved since I met you.{break}{mood:happy}And now we're MARRIED! I can't believe how amazing it is to be married to you.{break}{mood:love}I had no idea you were just around the corner this whole time, and that I was just waiting for you. I love you.

{mood:like}I hope so.{break}{mood:happy}On paper, I agree. I mean, I'm a business owner!{break}{mood:default}Still, that little girl with the doll wedding obsession? I know what she'd say.{break}{mood:laugh}But then again, when have I ever listened to the opinions of children?{break}{mood:like}I think I'm pretty happy with what I have.{break}{mood:love}Like... what WE have.{break}I love you.

So, I'm... not great at talking about my feelings, but I just wanted to say...{break}{mood:like}Thank you for finding Waldo. And helping him come back to us.{break}{mood:default}I really... missed my best friend. I don't think I even realised how much.{break}{mood:happy}So, thank you. From the bottom of my heart.

{mood:dislike}Do you really think that? I mean, being against marriage, sure...{break}{mood:default}But you're not even... curious? You think it's a scam?{break}I don't agree. I think it's a way to express love and commitment.{break}{mood:sad}Maybe you just don't want that. Or you just don't want that... with me.{break}...I think you should go.
{mood:like}Hey, I was thinking... if we, um, ever have kids...{break}{mood:happy}Maybe we could think about using Waldo as a middle name? It's just an idea!

{mood:happy}Oh, je ne me suis pas présentée !{break}{mood:default}Je m'appelle Ossono et je tiens la taverne de l'île de la Pierre de lune.{break}Passe quand tu veux !{break}{mood:laugh}Enfin, quand c'est ouvert, évidemment.

{mood:like}Merci de m'avoir proposé de venir me balader avec toi.{break}J'adore la plage à la nuit tombée.{break}{mood:default}Parfois, j'ai l'impression que c'est le seul moment où je peux respirer un bon coup.{break}Enfin, du moment que ça ne sent pas trop le poisson.{break}Ma question va te sembler bizarre, mais... est-ce que ton travail te plaît ?
{mood:happy}Super ! On se retrouve à 20 heures !
Oui, on ne s'ennuie pas !
Une autre fois, peut-être.
Bonjour.{random}Oh, salut !{random}Salut !{random}Ça roule ?
Ça va.
On vient souvent ici. Allons ailleurs, pour une fois.
Salut, trésor !
Bof...

{mood:like}C'est bien ce que je pensais !{break}Tu fais plein de trucs différents.{break}Tu t'occupes des cultures, tu casses des pierres et tout le toutim.{break}{mood:happy}Franchement, je t'envie un peu !{break}{mood:default}Parfois, j'ai l'impression que les jours se suivent et se ressemblent, à la taverne.{break}J'essaie de rompre la monotonie en m'occupant du courrier et d'autres trucs de ce genre...{break}{mood:like}Mais ce soir, c'était vraiment chouette. Merci pour ce moment.{break}Bonne nuit !
À plus.{random}À bientôt.{random}Bye !

{mood:like}Je parie que ça doit être amusant.{break}{mood:laugh}On devrait échanger nos places, un de ces quatre !{break}{mood:like}T'inquiète, je rigole. Je pourrais jamais faire ce que tu fais.{break}{mood:laugh}J'arrive même pas à soulever les fûts de bière toute seule, Quill doit m'aider.{break}{mood:like}Alors que toi, tu bannis des esprits et tout... C'est super impressionnant.{break}{mood:like}Bon, je dois y aller, il se fait tard.{break}{mood:happy}Bonne nuit !
{mood:happy}C'est pour moi ? Vraiment ?{break}Ça va m'aider à tenir jusqu'à la fin de la journée. Merci !
À la prochaine !

Oh, c'est dommage.{break}{mood:sad}Tu as dû suivre un entraînement spécifique, tu as quitté tes parents... et tu n'aimes même pas ce que tu fais ?{break}Si j'étais à ta place, je crois que je m'enfuirais et que je changerais d'identité.{break}{mood:laugh}J'irais bosser dans une boulangerie dans un trou paumé où la guilde des alchimistes ne pourrait pas me retrouver.{break}{mood:like}J'espère que tu finiras par apprécier ton métier.{break}{mood:default}Bon... Je ferais mieux de rentrer, il est tard.{break}Bonne nuit.
{mood:like}T'as mis en plein dans le mille ! J'adore les fleurs !{break}En plus, elles sentent super bon. Merci !
À ce soir !
Oh, merci pour ce cadeau !
Allez, je retourne bosser.

{mood:happy}Je suis ravie que tu m'aies proposé de retourner à la plage !{break}{mood:default}C'est l'un de mes endroits préférés.{break}On a tellement de chance d'avoir à la fois la plage et la montagne sur cette île. J'adore ça.{break}{npc:up}Est-ce que c'est pareil, sur les autres îles ?{break}{npc:left}{mood:happy}Tu devrais m'emmener, un de ces jours. Je pourrais t'aider !
Oh noooon...{break}{mood:awkward}Je suis désolée, mais j'ai horreur de ça.{break}{mood:default}Alors, non merci.
Au revoir, trésor !
Ton aide serait la bienvenue.
{mood:dislike}Pourquoi tu veux m'offrir ça ? C'est une blague ? Ça pue.
D'accord, mais tu n'es pas obligée de m'aider !
Salut, mon lapin !{random}Viens faire un gros bisou à ta femme !
Non, c'est trop dangereux.

Als ich klein war, dachte ich immer, ich wäre inzwischen sicher sesshaft geworden.{break}{mood:laugh}Ich habe die Hochzeiten meiner Puppen bis ins kleinste Detail geplant.{break}{mood:default}Ich weiß nicht mal, ob ich das wirklich wollte. Ich dachte es einfach nur.{break}Jetzt bin ich älter ... und ein Teil von mir hat das Gefühl, dieses kleine Mädchen enttäuscht zu haben.{break}Ich verbringe jeden einzelnen Tag in der Taverne.{break}Wenn ich nicht arbeite, schlafe ich. Jeder Tag mit dir ist ein Geschenk.{break}Und auch jede Nacht ... falls du wieder hier übernachten willst.

... Das stimmt schon.{break}Aber ich bin sie und sie ist ich.{break}Und was ich jetzt will, ist viel wichtiger.{break}Und ehrlich gesagt ... liebe ich meine Arbeit.{break}{mood:like}Auch wenn ich definitiv mehr Pausen machen könnte.{break}{mood:love}Besonders, wenn diese Pausen bedeuten, Zeit mit dir zu verbringen.{break}{mood:laugh}Du bist so verdammt klug. Yo no sería capaz de hacer lo que haces tú.{break}{mood:laugh}O sea, es que ni siquiera puedo llevar los toneles de cerveza yo sola. ¡Me tiene que ayudar Púo!{break}{mood:like}Y, mientras, tú andas por ahí viéndotelas con espíritus y esas cosas. ¡Eres la pera!{break}{mood:like}Tengo que irme..., que se me hace tarde.{break}{mood:happy}¡Buenas noches!

{mood:happy}¡Y a mí también! Cuanto más raras, mejor.{break}¡Los demás vecinos no son así de valientes!{break}{mood:like}Siempre intento colar alguna cosilla rara en el menú, entre la comida convencional.{break}{mood:laugh}Si solo me dedicara a experimentar en la cocina, no ganaría ni para pipas.{break}{mood:awkward}Oye, ya sé que suena raro, pero...{break}Se me acaba de ocurrir una ideaza para un plato nuevo.{break}{mood:laugh}¡Tengo que apuntarla o se me olvidará!{break}{mood:happy}Perdona por cortar aquí la cita. ¡A ver si lo repetimos!

{mood:like}¿Tú no haces otra cosa que ir de aquí para allá todo el día? ¡Ya me gustaría a mí!

{mood:sad}Ah, sí. Puede que tengas razón.{break}Debería centrarme en lo que sé hacer.{break}Probar cosas nuevas... no siempre compensa.{break}{mood:default}Mejor me voy antes de que se haga tarde. Adiós.
Mucha gente odia los miércoles, pero yo creo que no están tan mal.
¡Ah! ¿Me estás pidiendo que sea tu novia?

{mood:sad}... y creo que Púo lo está pasando mal últimamente, pero no sé qué le pasa.{break}{mood:default}Nunca le cuenta sus penas a nadie.{break}¡No sé cómo ablandarlo para que confíe en mí y me hable de sus sentimientos!{break}{mood:laugh}Bueno, paro ya, que estoy dándote la turra con mis cosas.{break}{mood:like}Ah, antes de que se me olvide... ¡Sí! ¿Te gustaría?

{mood:dislike}¡Feliz martes!{break}¡Me acabo de encontrar una rata en el sótano de la taberna!

¿Alguna vez echas de menos a tus amigos y familiares?

¡Pues claro!
{mood:like}¡Qué falta me hacía el día libre!{break}Puede que luego me vaya a nadar un rato.
A mí también me gusta cómo hueles.
Ya te avisaré si me animo.
Tienes que darles una vueltecilla a esos cumplidos.
{mood:happy}¡Qué bien!{break}{mood:like}Pues, venga..., ¡vamos a prepararnos! Va a ser espectacular.
